<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Your registration has been confirmed for the Honeywell Operators Conference in Geneva. Event: Honeywell Operators Conference
Date: June 11, 2018
Location: Mövenpick Hotel & Casino Geneva | 20, route de Pre Bois | 1215 Geneve, Switzerland
Please contact us at Anna.Tomova@honeywell.com with any questions.
We look forward to meeting you during our event.
Sincerely,
Honeywell Aerospace Events Team
